attributes.action: Make November 23rd a National Bank Holiday to celebrate the birth of Doctor Who
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On November 23rd 1963 Doctor Who was televised for the first time.

To celebrate it's huge success and culural meaning to the British way of life we should have a National Bank Holiday: Doctor Who Day on November 23rd annually.

Doctor Who celebrates 50 glorious years in 2013 - it is a British institution and should therefore be recognised for it's moral outlook and for entertaining millions worldwide.

Doctor Who is British at it best!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
